sentences.en: A brief, hand-written postscript lay beneath his signature.
sentences.cn: 在他的签名下，有一句简短的手写附言。

sentences.en: A brief, handwritten postscript lay beneath his signature.
sentences.cn: 在他的签名下，有一句简短的手写附言。

sentences.en: As a postscript to his letter he added that he loved her.
sentences.cn: 他在信中加上附言,写上了他爱她.

sentences.en: As the editor's postscript reminds the reader, she was to endure two more spells of mental illness before the book was published.
sentences.cn: 正如编辑在附言中提醒读者的那样，她在本书出版前还要再经历两次精神疾病发作的折磨。

sentences.en: I should like to add a postscript to your obituary for John Cage.
sentences.cn: 我想在你为约翰·凯奇写的讣告后补充一点内容。

sentences.en: Printers were black - and - white , so PostScript didn't need any complex image compositing operators.
sentences.cn: 由于打印机是 黑白 的, 所以PostScript并不需要任何复杂的图像混合操作.

sentences.en: She added a postscript to her letter.
She mentioned in a postscript to her letter that the parcel had arrived.
sentences.cn: 她在信末附笔中说包裹已寄到.

sentences.en: She tagged a postscript to the end of the letter.
The paper is composed of introductory, body and postscript.
sentences.cn: 论文分引言 、 主体、后记三个部分.

sentences.en: The thesis contains five parts besides preface, summarize and postscript.
sentences.cn: 全文除引言 、 结束语和后记外,共分为五个部分.

sentences.en: The whole dissertation is composed of five chapters except preface and postscript.
sentences.cn: 全文除前言、后记外,由五章组成.

sentences.en: There was the usual romantic postscript at the end of his letter.
sentences.cn: 他的信末又是一贯的浪漫附言.

sentences.en: This article include the preface, the text, the epilogue and the postscript.
sentences.cn: 本文分为前言 、 正文 、 结语、后记等几部分.

sentences.en: You attached great importance, then, to this postscript, my dear Monsieur Cavalcanti?
sentences.cn: 那么, 您对于这句附言觉得很重要吗, 我亲爱的卡瓦尔康蒂先生?

sentences.en: You'd better add a postscript on to the letter inquiring about her health.
sentences.cn: 你还是在信的末尾加几句问候她健康的话好.

trans.tran_cn: （信末签名后的）附言，又及，（正文后的）补充说明
trans.tran_en: a message written at the end of a letter after you have signed your name
